accountGeneratedWithRecoveryPhrase.message: This account was generated with your MetaMask Secret Recovery Phrase.

accountRecoveryInfo.message: Note: Your account will be automatically recovered. Future upgrades will be managed automatically.

connectToMetaMask.message: Click on connect, the new version will be proposed for installation.

deleteCurrentVersionMetaMask.message: Delete the current version in MetaMask by going in Settings > Snaps > @consensys/starknet-snap > See details > Remove Snap

deployTransactionPendingPart1.message: Your deploy transaction is still pending and has reached the maximum retry limit for status checks. Please wait for the transaction to complete.

deployTransactionPendingPart2.message: Please try again in a couple of hours.

deploymentNecessaryToProceedPart1.message: A deployment of your address is necessary to proceed with the Snap.

deploymentNecessaryToProceedPart2.message: Click on the "Deploy" button to proceed.

disableMetaMaskExtension.message: Please make sure that the regular MetaMask extension is disabled or use a different browser profile

errorCalculatingGasFees.message: Error when trying to calculate the gas fees

feesIncludeOneTimeDeploymentFee.message: Fees include a one-time deployment fee

gasFeesDefinition.message: Gas fees are defined by the network and fluctuate depending on network traffic and transaction complexity.

installLatestVersion.message: To use this dapp, please install the latest version by following those steps:

installMetaMaskFlaskToUseSnap.message: You need to install MetaMask Flask extension in order to use the Starknet Snap.

installMetaMaskToUseSnap.message: You need to install MetaMask extension in order to use the Starknet Snap.

metaMaskExtensionRequired.message: You don't have the MetaMask extension

metaMaskFlaskExtensionRequired.message: You don't have the MetaMask Flask extension

metaMaskUpgradeNeeded.message: An upgrade of MetaMask is needed to use this dApp

newVersionAvailable.message: A new version of the Starknet Snap is available

newVersionOfSmartContractNecessaryPart1.message: A new version of the smart contract is necessary to proceed with the Snap.

newVersionOfSmartContractNecessaryPart2.message: New enhancements will come with this version.

newVersionOfSmartContractNecessaryPart3.message: Click on the "Upgrade" button to install it.

nonZeroBalanceOnCairo0.message: You have a non-zero balance on a Cairo 0 non-deployed address

openBetaVersion.message: This is the Open Beta version of the dapp, updates are made regularly

pasteRecipientAddress.message: Paste recipient address or .stark name here

snapsExtendMetaMask.message: Snaps extend the capabilities of MetaMask by adding new functionalities. This Snap allows MetaMask to be compatible with Starknet and manage your keys.

starknetSnapInstallationPrompt.message: If you do not have the Starknet snap installed you will be prompted to install it.

tokenCreationWarning.message: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens. Learn more about scams and security risks.

updateMetaMaskVersion.message: Please update to MetaMask Version {1} or higher.

upgradeTransactionPendingPart1.message: Your upgrade transaction is still pending and has reached the maximum retry limit for status checks. Please wait for the transaction to complete.

upgradeTransactionPendingPart2.message: Please try again in a couple of hours.

validStarknetAddressOnly.message: Please only enter a valid Starknet address or .stark name. Sending funds to a different network might result in permanent loss.

waitingForTransaction.message: Waiting for transaction to be complete.
